subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The reigning American League Cy Young award winner, C. C. Sabathia, gave up 9 runs and 12 hits in his shortest outing in nearly two years, and the Oakland Athletics held on Friday night to beat the host Cleveland Indians, 9-7.
snippet: The reigning American League Cy Young award winner, C. C. Sabathia, gave up 9 runs and 12 hits in his shortest outing in nearly two years, and the Oakland Athletics held on Friday night to beat the host Cleveland Indians, 9-7.
